mode.description: Selects the mode of behavior for the explosive.

collision_raycast_filter.description: Selects the filter used for raycast collision detection

arming_delay.description: Time it takes to arm the explosive.

explosion_delay.description: Time it takes from armed to explosion. For impact, this is the minimum timer!

removal_delay.description: Time it takes to remove the explosive after detonating.

start_active.description: [bool]The explosive has to be active before it can be armed.

hide_on_explosion.description: [bool]The explosive is hidden immediately on explosion, then removed later.

destroy_actor_on_explosion.description: [bool]The explosive is hidden immediately on explosion, then removed later.

ignore_friendly_fire.description: [bool]The explosive will not trigger if colliding with friendlies.

impact_distance.description: The minimum distance ahead of the explosive's root to check for collisions that trigger the impact explosion.

impact_airburst_distance.description: Impact Only! Distance to check to the ground to check for airburst explosion.

explosion_type.description: The type of explosion, see explosion_settings.h for types.

impact_explosion_type.description: The type of explosion, see explosion_settings.h for types.

on_exploded_sound.description: [wwise]The sound to play when this entity explodes. Outside of the actual explosion-sound.

on_status_effect_done_sound.description: [wwise]The sound to play when the status effect is done.

armed_effect.description: Particle effect to play (fire-and-forget) when this explosive is armed.

trail_effect.description: Particle effect to play when this entity is spawned and stop playing it when this entity stops moving.

status_effect_particle_effect.description: The particle effect to play when running the status effect

status_effect_done_particle_effect.description: The particle effect to play when the status effect is done (fire and forget).

armed_sound.description: [wwise]The sound to play when this explosive is armed.

status_effect_template.description: The status effects to apply if using TimedStatusEffect type.

trigger_actor.description: [string]The actor, if any, to enable when the explosive comes to rest in the world.

collision_actor.description: [string]The actor, if any, to disable when the explosive comes to rest in the world.

explode_on_death.description: [bool]If the explosive dies via health component, should it explode?

on_armed_ability.description: If specified, this ability will be triggered when the explosive is armed.
